Page One:
Little Nini was wearing her favorite cute dress and carrying a backpack, ready for an adventure.
As she walked down the street, she saw a little boy crying.
Page Two:
Nini asked, 'What happened? Why are you crying?'
The little boy replied, I'm lost, and I can't find my way home.
Page Three:
Nini immediately felt sad because she had been lost before.
She decided to help the little boy find his way home.
